name: Bauhaus- Soul and Body at Art
name_original: Bauhaus- Soul and Body at Art
description:
Made for GMLT Game Jam

An artist joined the Bauhaus school of art.

He is linked with his artwork.

Together they trying to move inside the Bauhaus and improve his art skills and art knowledge.

Avoid obstacles and try to figure out the right way. In the end, both he and his artwork have to reach their goal!
